languages.text: "Хотел{mf||а} бы я ободрить тебя и обнять. Но ты не терпишь человеческих прикосновений".
"I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."
languages.original_text: "Хотел{mf||а} бы я ободрить тебя и обнять. Но ты не терпишь человеческих прикосновений".

traits.locale_text: "I would love to hug you and cheer you up. But you can't stand the human touch."
"I would love to hug you and cheer you up. But you can't stand the human touch."
"I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."
"I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."
"I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

languages.text: “我真希望能抱抱你，给你一些慰藉，但我知道你无法忍受人类的触碰。”
languages.original_text: "I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

traits.locale_text: “我真希望能抱抱你，给你一些慰藉，但我知道你无法忍受人类的触碰。”

languages.text: «Ojalá pudiese abrazarte y darte el consuelo que necesitas, pero sé que no soportas el contacto de un ser humano».
languages.original_text: "I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá pudiese abrazarte y darte el consuelo que necesitas, pero sé que no soportas el contacto de un ser humano».

languages.text: « J'aimerais vous serrer dans mes bras pour vous apporter un peu de réconfort, mais vous ne supportez pas le contact avec {mf|un humain|une humaine}. »
languages.original_text: "I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais vous serrer dans mes bras pour vous apporter un peu de réconfort, mais vous ne supportez pas le contact avec {mf|un humain|une humaine}. »

languages.text: "Ich würde Euch gerne umarmen und trösten, aber ich weiß, dass Ihr menschliche Berührungen nicht ertragt."
languages.original_text: "I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euch gerne umarmen und trösten, aber ich weiß, dass Ihr menschliche Berührungen nicht ertragt."

languages.text: 「お前を抱きしめて、慰めてやりたい。だが、お前は人間との触れ合いには耐えられないだろう」
languages.original_text: "I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を抱きしめて、慰めてやりたい。だが、お前は人間との触れ合いには耐えられないだろう」

languages.text: "Keşke sana sarılıp biraz rahatlatabilseydim ama insan dokunuşuna katlanamıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "I wish I could embrace you and give you comfort, but you cannot bear human touch."

traits.locale_text: "Keşke sana sarılıp biraz rahatlatabilseydim ama insan dokunuşuna katlanamıyorsun."
